remarks: Binary relation expressing ` Y ` covers ` X ` .  Definition of covers in [Kalmbach] p. 15.  ( ~ cvbr2 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrletr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrletr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrletr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrletr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrval2 $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> ( X .< Y /\ A. z e. B ( ( X .< z /\ z .<_ Y ) -> z = Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
$d K z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
